name: import vector gis
desc: Reads vector file formats such as shapefiles.

properties.name: Switch Property View
properties.desc: Edit the renderable (red) port properties for the module.

properties.name: Use Application Origin
properties.desc: When true, the module will apply the Application Origin. When false, data will be left in internal model space.

properties.name: Line Width
properties.desc: The width to set Line elements from the input data.

properties.name: Include Attributes As Data
properties.desc: If Include Attributes As Data is turned on then each attribute will be set as cell data.

properties.name: Assign Data To Z
properties.desc: If the Assign Data To Z toggle is on and Include Attributes As Data is on, then the selected data will be assigned as the Z coordinate.

properties.name: Default Color
properties.desc: If no data is assigned to the model then the default color can be set here.

properties.name: Data To Display
properties.desc: The Data To Display allows the user to set which data component will be displayed in the Output Object Port.

properties.name: Data To Assign To Z
properties.desc: The Data To Assign To Z choice allows the user to select which data is assigned as the z coordinates.

properties.name: Convert To Packaged
properties.desc: Replace this module with a packaged version of the data.
